thought: To implement the requested workflow, I need to define the necessary functions: a manual trigger, reading Google Sheets data, AI classification using aiCompletion, and sending emails with Gmail.
plan: Define manual trigger function to start the workflow.
Define Google Sheets read action to get commercial entries.
Define aiCompletion action to classify each Description.
Define Gmail send message action to send classification results.
criticism: The initial plan lacks refinement on data handling and error checking, but it is sufficient to start defining the basic functions.
